name: Shadow Platformer
description:
Shadow Platformer is a two-player puzzle/platformer game where you both try to reach the portal. Any feedbacks are appreciated.

KEYS:

  • WASD - First Player Movement
  • Arrow Keys - Second Player Movement
  • R - Reset Game
  • ESC - Pause Game

A timer starts every time you start from the first level and your run time is saved when you finished the game. You can submit your score to the leaderboard to see where you and your friend are among all the players who have finished the game.

Game Music: Kim Lightyear - Angel Eyes (Chiptune Edit)
